DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare the effect of 6 weeks of treatment with Rosuvastatin with 6 weeks of treatment with Atorvastatin in African American subjects with hypercholesterolemia.
DOC.brief_title: Rosuvastatin Versus Atorvastatin in the Treatment of Hypercholesterolaemia in African American Subjects(ARIES)
DOC.criteria: Fasting low density lipoprotein level as defined by the protocol. Self described African American race Fasting triglyceride level as defined by the protocol. The use of lipid lowering drugs or dietary supplements after Visit 1. Active arterial disease eg Unstable angina, or recent arterial surgery Blood lipid levels above the limits defined in the protocol. Uncontrolled hypertension, hypothyroidism, alcohol or drug abuse.
